rasters.yes_the_raster_is_temporal: Yes, this is a raster series

rasters.which_organisations_would_you_like_to_sh: Select other organisations that need read acces to this raster
rasters.files_non_temporal_upload_multiple_files: For non-temporal rasters it is not possible to upload more than 1 file
